mapper.insert: insert into tb_goods (goods_id, goods_name, product_id, shop_id, shop_name, cost_price, sell_price, inventory, is_specification, spec_info, status, is_putaway, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, is_delete, bak1, bak2, bak3) values (#{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sellPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inventory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isSpecification,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{specInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isPutaway,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bak1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bak2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bak3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select goods_id, goods_name, product_id, shop_id, shop_name, cost_price, sell_price, inventory, is_specification, spec_info, status, is_putaway, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, is_delete, bak1, bak2, bak3 from tb_goods where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
